The '''[[Tolkien Society]]''' grants every year five '''Awards''' as a way to recognise excellence in [[Tolkien studies]], art and [[fandom]]. Winners are announced during the Annual Dinner in the Annual General Meeting of the Society.{{webcite|articleurl=https://www.tolkiensociety.org/society/awards/|articlename=Awards|website=TS|accessed=15 December 2022}} If any retribution is granted, it is not indicated.
